nir.sen@earthlink.net
comments.text:
Confirming this bug.

I'm using 'Minefield/3.0a2pre' under Fedora core 6.

In my case , Firefox crashes *without* calling 'TalkBack' , console windows shows only this error message

"/usr/Minefield/run-mozilla.sh: line 131: 23868 Floating point exception"$prog" ${1+"$@"}"

Successfully reproduced this problem every time login to hotmail account(using a new profile).
seems to me that this bug has occurred just after todays update.
